/* resume.selectResumeTotCnt */ SELECT CNT + TEMP_CNT AS TOT_CNT
FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME WHERE 1=1 AND USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y') RE
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS TEMP_CNT FROM CPES_RESUME_TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y') RE_TEMP ON 1=1

/* resume.selectTempResumeCheck */
SELECT CASE WHEN RE.CNT > 0 AND RE_TEMP.CNT = 0 THEN '10' WHEN RE.CNT = 0 AND RE_TEMP.CNT > 0 THEN '20' ELSE '30' END AS RE_TYPE
FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME WHERE 1=1 AND RESUME_SEQ = #{resumeSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y') RE
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_RESUME_TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND RESUME_SEQ = #{resumeSeq} AND USE_YN = 'Y') RE_TEMP ON 1=1
SELECT JR.JOBSK_REQ_SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(JR.REG_DT, '%d/%m/%Y') AS REG_DT FROM CPES_JOBSK_REQ JR WHERE 1=1 AND JR.RESUME_SEQ = #{resumeSeq} AND JR.JC_AGREE_STS_CD = 'JSC0000000002' AND JR.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT RI.RESUME_ISCO_SEQ , RI.ISCO_CD , (SELECT CASE WHEN UPPER(#{langCd}) = 'KH' THEN KH_NM ELSE EN_NM END AS NM FROM CPES_ISCO_CD WHERE ISCO_CD = RI.ISCO_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS ISCO_CD_NM , RI.RESUME_SEQ FROM CPES_RESUME_ISCO RI WHERE 1=1 AND RI.RESUME_SEQ = #{resumeSeq}

SELECT A.CNT + B.CNT + C.CNT AS TOT_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_APPLIC AP WHERE AP.APPLIC_CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND AP.RESUME_SEQ = #{value}) A,
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_OFFER WHERE RESUME_SEQ = #{value}) B,
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM CPES_INTVW INTV LEFT JOIN CPES_APPLIC AP ON INTV.APPLIC_SEQ = AP.APPLIC_SEQ WHERE AP.APPLIC_CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND AP.RESUME_SEQ = #{value} AND INTV.INTVW_DT < NOW()) C
SELECT RESUME_SEQ FROM CPES_RESUME WHERE USER_SEQ = #{value} AND PRI_RESUME_YN = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
